channel.title: Forums Upgrade?
channel.description: For the admins that never knew yet, SMF v1.1 has been fully released. I just saw this forums is using SMF 1.1 RC2, while RC3 was out months ago. Also, I had no idea where to post this because there is no offtopic section. Every section has to do with Runescape.

item.title: Forums Upgrade?
item.dc:creator: @Skyrider Skyrider
item.description:
@Skyrider wrote:

phpbb sucks totally --, Vbulletin costs money, will you pay it? SMF the best free Forums out there.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 03:11:42 PM[/size][hr]><, more replies?

Read full topic
